    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> awardedAchievementIDs()
      Returns a list of achievement IDs corresponding to all of the achievements that the player has been awarded.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> inProgressAchievementIDs()
      Returns a list of achievement IDs corresponding to all of the achievements that the player has some progress in but hasn't been awarded with yet.
      int progressForAchievement(Achievement achievement)
      Returns the progress of this instance's player for the given achievement.
